snippet.title: MeMic Announcements Trailer
snippet.description:
Add MeMic to your wishlist on Steam!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3336430?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement

👾 About the Game:
MeMic is a unique stealth game where you play as a mimic who disguises as objects, avoids enemies, and uses secret passages to achieve their goals. Experience the thrill of every move in a world filled with dangers and secrets!

🔥 Key Features:

Unique disguise mechanics.
Secret passages for fast movement.
Atmospheric locations with Easter eggs and mysteries.
Deep gameplay for stealth game lovers.
🎮 Stay Connected:
Follow us for updates:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3336430?utm_source=youtube&utm_campaign=announcement
X/Twitter: https://x.com/MeMicGame
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/onlinekingdom.gamedev/

#MeMic #gamedev  #indiegame  #stealthgame  #steam  #fantasy  #darkfantasygame  #gametrailers  #indiedev  #gamingcommunity
